prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a glowing fish with bright yellow accents and a friendly expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that illuminates dark waters, combining electric and aquatic features in a sleek design.
Design a Pokemon with a round body and long antennae, showcasing shades of blue and yellow, perfect for underwater adventures.
Generate a unique Pokemon that has a playful demeanor and lights up its surroundings, blending electric and water elements.
Show me a Pokemon with a whimsical appearance, featuring a bulbous body and bright fins, ideal for ocean exploration.
Make a Pokemon that appears both cute and mysterious, with luminescent features and a sleek aquatic shape.
Give me a Pokemon that combines aquatic grace with electric charm, showcasing a vibrant color palette and an enchanting glow.
